item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the December meeting of the Greater Boston NLP group.

Law of Attraction Meets Hypnosis and NLP

What a better way to end the year than to set up your opportunities for the coming year. Or, manifest what you have not been able to do until now.

In this meetup we will concentrate on techniques in NLP and/or hypnosis that compliment, if not accelerate the Law of Attraction.

We will discuss the basics of the LOA and what holds us back from utilizing it properly. We will then learn and experience some techniques that allow for proper utilization of the Law of Attraction.

Let's learn how to create our lives, instead of having it created for us.

"The soul attracts that which it secretly harbors;
that which it loves, and also that which it fears."
â€”James Allen



Kevin

Kevin Martin
NLP Master Practitioner, Hypnotist
Positive Effects
Methuen, MA
(978) 273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com----------------------------------
Helping people to help themselves.
item.how_to_find_us: Go straight back to the large studio (after 7pm)

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Natick - Law of Attraction Meets NLP
